title: internal compiler error: the following error was constructed but not emitted: unexpected token: `.`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
I'm seeing an internal compiler error on the following input, found by [fuzz-rustc](https://github.com/dwrensha/fuzz-rustc): ### Code ```rust fn main(){ ...=. } ``` ### Error output ``` error: unexpected token: `...` --> src/main.rs:2:5 | 2 | ...=. | ^^^ | help: use `..` for an exclusive range | 2 | ..=. | ~~ help: or `..=` for an inclusive range | 2 | ..==. | ~~~ error: internal compiler error: the following error was constructed but not emitted error: unexpected token: `.` --> src/main.rs:2:9 | 2 | ...=. | ^ thread 'rustc' panicked at 'explicit panic', compiler/rustc_errors/src/diagnostic_builder.rs:453:13 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace ``` Affected versions: I tried stable 1.56.1 and nightly 2021-11-16
Backtrace

``` Compiling playground v0.0.1 (/playground) error: unexpected token: `...` --> src/main.rs:2:5 | 2 | ...=. | ^^^ | help: use `..` for an exclusive range | 2 | ..=. | ~~ help: or `..=` for an inclusive range | 2 | ..==. | ~~~ error: internal compiler error: the following error was constructed but not emitted error: unexpected token: `.` --> src/main.rs:2:9 | 2 | ...=. | ^ thread 'rustc' panicked at 'explicit panic', compiler/rustc_errors/src/diagnostic_builder.rs:453:13 stack backtrace: 0: rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/d914f17ca71a33a89b2dc3436fca51b1a091559e/library/std/src/panicking.rs:498:5 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt at /rustc/d914f17ca71a33a89b2dc3436fca51b1a091559e/library/core/src/panicking.rs:106:14 2: core::panicking::panic at /rustc/d914f17ca71a33a89b2dc3436fca51b1a091559e/library/core/src/panicking.rs:47:5 3: ::drop 4: core::ptr::drop_in_place:: 5: ::inclusive_range_with_incorrect_end 6: ::collect_tokens_for_expr::<::parse_prefix_range_expr::{closure#0}>::{closure#0} 7: ::parse_assoc_expr_with 8: ::parse_stmt_without_recovery 9: ::parse_block_tail 10: ::parse_fn_body 11: ::parse_item_common 12: ::parse_mod 13: rustc_parse::parse_crate_from_file 14: ::time::, rustc_interface::passes::parse::{closure#0}> 15: rustc_interface::passes::parse 16: ::parse 17: ::enter::, rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> 18: rustc_span::with_source_map::, rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#1}> 19: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run::, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}> 20: >::set::, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.58.0-nightly (d914f17ca 2021-11-16) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C codegen-units=1 -C debuginfo=2 --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `playground` due to 2 previous errors ```

I already found a solution, this line is missing `e.cancel()` before dropping the error returned by `parse_pat_range_end`: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/c9c4b5d7276297679387189d96a952f2b760e7ad/compiler/rustc_parse/src/parser/pat.rs#L820
